sentences.english: The thickened septa are most often smooth, but septal nodules may sometimes be seen.
sentences.chinese: 增厚的小叶间隔常平滑，但有时可呈结节状。

sentences.english: The resection of occipital condylar and jugular tuber can increase surgical freedom.
sentences.chinese: 枕髁和颈静脉结节的磨除可增加手术视野。

sentences.english: Results No spirochete was found in the lesions of sarcoidosis.
sentences.chinese: 结果在结节病肉芽肿病变内未发现螺旋体。

sentences.english: There were no obvious differences between cold-cool nodule group and controls.
sentences.chinese: 冷凉结节组与对照组差异无显著性。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment of hepatic focal nodular hyperplasia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肝脏局灶结节性增生的诊断和治疗经验。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the recurrent reasons about tubercular goiters after operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的为探讨结节性甲状腺肿术后复发的原因。

sentences.english: The intertubercular sulcus was observed on 60 specimen of humerus.
sentences.chinese: 并在60例骨性标本上，对结节间沟进行观测。

sentences.english: This is a PAS stain of nodular glomerulosclerosis (Kimmelstiel-Wilson disease) in a patient with long-standing diabetes mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 长期糖尿病病人结节性肾小球硬化的PAS染色。

sentences.english: Tuberous sclerosis is a common life long disease requiring long-term follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 结节性硬化是一种常见的终身性疾病，需要长期随访。

sentences.english: The highest stress was found at the tuberodties of ischium.
sentences.chinese: 此时的坐骨结节处承受较大压应力。

sentences.english: Objective: To repair the bedsores on the ischial tuberosities.
sentences.chinese: 目的修复坐骨结节褥疮。

sentences.english: Is getting a waist to take off lifelong sex disease?
sentences.chinese: 结节性硬化是一种常见的终身性疾病，需要长期随访。

sentences.english: Nodes under the ependyma and nodes in the cortex were characteristic expressions in CT.
sentences.chinese: CT上有室管膜下钙化结节和皮质结节特征性表现。

sentences.english: Nodes under the ependyma and nodes in the cortex were characteristic expressions in CT.
sentences.chinese: CT上有室管膜下钙化结节和皮质结节特征性表现。

sentences.english: Here is another example of benign prostatic hyperplasia. Nodules appear mainly in the lateral lobes.
sentences.chinese: 另例良性前列腺增生，小结节主要出现于侧叶。

sentences.english: Objective To provide the exact dimensions of the intertubercular sulcus of the humerus.
sentences.chinese: 目的提供详尽的肱骨结节间沟形态资料。
